title: Pembrokeshire, my county
creator_credit: British Information Services, Andrew Rice and Ronald Stark
brief_description: A film on the Welsh country of Pembrokeshire,, through the seasons, showing the scenic beauty of the countryside, buildings of interest, and something of agriculture and social life of the country. Highlights of the film include shots of abundant wild life of the region, pleasures of sailing at Milford and unique scenes in the Cistercian monastery at Caldey Island.
